reviews.customers_say: Customers find these underwear comfortable, well-made, and super soft, with a high-waisted fit that sits perfectly on hips. The cotton material receives positive feedback, with one customer noting its breathable properties, and they appreciate the cute colors that make their buttocks look fabulous. The seam thickness and sizing receive mixed reviews - while some say they hold up well and are true to size, others repo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very comfortable & affordable!
items.body: True to size! Very soft & comfy. I love the cut of it and how it fits on my body. It is very good quality & I really enjoy these. I think this is a great affordable option for very nice underwear. Read more
items.author: Gracie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these
items.body: Love these!!! They are comfortable, true to size. No panty lines, good quality material is soft, feels like your not wearing anything very light and breathable . I will be buying again Read more
items.author: Nicole Weinberger

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you're looking for 100% cotton underwear, this is a good option at a good price!!
items.body: The fabric is cotton, they are comfortable, the underwear doesn't show through, it doesn't move around, and it's not tight, which makes it comfortable. To keep it in perfect condition, I recommend using a delicate cycle; do not use the dryer. Or, if you prefer, hand washing is best. Read more
items.author: C.M.

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect combo of cotton and stretch
items.body: Basic and comfortable. Perfect under leggings. They run small, so you may want to size up. Read more
items.author: LK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great underwear!
items.body: I waited too LONG to find these. They are so comfortable and definitely BREATHABLE. I haven't even been wearing any of my old underwear. I'm not sweating like I did down below with the old ones. I feel a lot better! They come vacuum sealed and in a cute little envelop. I almost didn't buy it because of the reviews talking about quality but they are good quality to me. They fit perfectly! They seem like they will last a LONG time.. They have already been washed over 5 times already and they are still brand new quality. The color choices are great too! I will be buying more and more! Read more
items.author: Packie Tills

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy Cotton Comfort
items.body: I am loving the comfort and fit! Solid seams, quality material and they do not roll or cut me up the middle. I will definitely be ordering another pack! Read more
items.author: Kim B

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable underwear
items.body: These underwear are pretty comfortable! I wanted to get underwear that are just basic cotton and decided to give these a try. They fit pretty well but the edges aren’t quite as soft or smooth as I had hoped they would be and they sit somewhere between high waist and low rise, which is a little weird. They’re durable and have held up well with multiple washes, and they don’t shrink. Overall, I like them but I would probably try something different the next time I’m in the market for new underwear. Read more
items.author: Erin Whitt

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So Comfy! (Even for Bigger Girls)
items.body: Oh my gosh I love these! Every thong I have ever bought has been uncomfortable: they don’t cover what I want them to and the move around too much. Not these though! These are amazing, I’m a bigger girl and these cover so well! They don’t move around too much and they’re so comfortable! Plus the price is great, I will definitely be buying these again! Read more
items.author: Zoe Burrows

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.
about_this_item:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black/Apricot, Black/Red/Khaki/Gray/White/Pink, Light Purple/Coral Pink/Light Blue/Light Pink/White/Nude, Black/Purple/Caramel/Khaki/Apricot/Gray, Apricot, Purple/Caramel/Khaki, Black/Mocha/Caramel/Apricot/White/Pink, Black, Black / Nude / Gray / Red / Green / Blue, Black/Khaki/Gray/White/Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
